TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CmdLineOptionParser extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Determines whether options that are specified to the command-line compiler jsc.exe are correctly formed, and reads the arguments if any are included.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string IsArgumentOption (string option, string prefix);
.method public static hidebysig string IsArgumentOption(string option, string prefix) cil managed

Docs.param: The command-line option that the user specified.
Docs.summary: Gets the argument from the specified command-line option. Applies to options that have only one name, such as /out:<filename>.
Docs.returns: The argument, "" if the argument is not specified, or null if the option or argument is not correctly formed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string IsArgumentOption (string option, string shortPrefix, string longPrefix);
.method public static hidebysig string IsArgumentOption(string option, string shortPrefix, string longPrefix) cil managed

Docs.param: The command-line option that the user specified.
The short form of the option name.
The long form of the option name.
Docs.summary: Gets the argument from the specified command-line option. Applies to options that can be specified by a short or long form of the option name, such as /r or /reference for /r[eference]:<file list>.
Docs.returns: The argument, "" if the argument is not specified, or null if the option or argument is not correctly formed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object IsBooleanOption (string option, string prefix);
.method public static hidebysig object IsBooleanOption(string option, string prefix) cil managed

Docs.param: The command-line option that the user specified.
Docs.summary: Gets the + or - argument from the specified command-line option. Applies to options that have only one name, such as /debug[+|-].
Docs.returns: for -; for + or if the argument is not specified; null if the option or argument is not correctly formed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object IsBooleanOption (string option, string shortPrefix, string longPrefix);
.method public static hidebysig object IsBooleanOption(string option, string shortPrefix, string longPrefix) cil managed

Docs.param: The command-line option that the user specified.
The short form of the option name.
The long form of the option name.
Docs.summary: Gets the + or - argument from the specified command-line option. Applies to options that can be specified by a short or long form of the option name.
Docs.returns: for -; for + or if the argument is not specified; null if the option or argument is not correctly formed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsSimpleOption (string option, string prefix);

Docs.param: The command-line option that the user specified.
Docs.summary: Verifies that the specified option is correctly formed.
Docs.returns: if the option is correctly formed; otherwise, .
